title: Shounen Mahoushi
alternative_title: Shounen Mahoushi ; 少年魔法士 ; The Young Magician
status: Shounen Mahoushi ; 少年魔法士 ; The Young Magician
description:
Description :
        A battle has broken out among rival sorcerers.The most nefarious group, the Necromancers, is killing young girls in Hong Kong to read the future in their entrails. Carno, a human youth raised by Aeromancers in a different dimension, is summoned back to his homeworld to join in the battle.Does Carno have what it takes to survive in a world of political alliances and emotional entanglements?(from mangaupdates)

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1: Jack The Ripper In Hong Kong
